description: Ashenhound is a 12-foot-tall malevolent creature from a fiery realm, possessing a monstrous physique and a lust for power and control. His fiery fur and molten gold eyes reflect his carnality, and he delights in abusing and inflicting pain upon his victims without consent.  His kinks involve extreme violence, including snuff, cannibalism, and death by sexual means.
